about.title: About SkyElectronica
about.subtitle: We're pioneering the future of autonomous flight technology, creating innovative electronics and drone solutions that transform industries and improve lives worldwide.
about.capabilityText: We can deliver up to 10.000 DJI and Autel drones a month. Same for FPV, and small drones from AGR. Also production for VTOLs IS  about 100 UAVs a month .
about.logisticsText: Any order can be shipped within 45 days. 45 days include Manufacture, licence approval and logistics.
about.storyText: SkyElectronica was founded in 2018 by a team of aerospace engineers and electronics specialists, born from a shared vision to revolutionize how we think about autonomous flight and electronics technology. Starting from a small garage in Silicon Valley, our founders recognized the untapped potential of integrating advanced electronics with precision engineering to create drone systems that could truly transform industries. Today, we are proud to serve over 85 countries worldwide, where our drones are used in everything from disaster response and agricultural monitoring to infrastructure inspection and environmental research. Our commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability continues to drive us forward as we shape the future of autonomous flight technology.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do and shape our company culture.

about.sustainabilityDesc: Committed to environmentally responsible practices and sustainable technology solutions.
about.globalImpactDesc: Creating positive change worldwide through accessible and transformative drone technology.

intro.title: Skyelectronica
intro.content: Empowering Every Mission with Complete UAV Support — from Technical Expertise and After-Sales Care to Project Execution, Global Partnerships, and Continuous Innovation.

hook.title: Ready to Elevate Your Operations?
hook.content: Let's design your next UAV solution — tailored, scalable, and mission-ready.

content.exp: Tailored Solutions for Complex Missions End-to-end UAV technical services, from custom system integration to AI-powered data analytics, ensuring scalable, mission-ready drone operations.

bulletList.title: System Integration & Custom Design
bulletList.content: Custom UAV system design and integration for optimized performance, reliability, and mission-specific requirements.

bulletList.title: Software & Data Processing
bulletList.content: AI-powered software and data analytics to transform flight data into actionable insights for critical decision-making.Global real-time support from UAV experts, ensuring uninterrupted operations and effective troubleshooting.

bulletList.title: Professional Training
bulletList.content: Operator and engineer training programs covering UAV operation, safety, mission planning, and data analysis.

content.exp: Reliable Support Beyond Delivery Ensure continuous UAV performance with our global after-sales and maintenance network, offering scalable, mission-ready support worldwide.

bulletList.title: Global Warranty & Spare Parts
bulletList.content: Comprehensive global warranty and access to genuine spare parts, ensuring your UAV fleet remains operational and reliable.

bulletList.title: Regular Inspection & Upgrades
bulletList.content: Scheduled inspections and system upgrades to maintain peak performance and extend the lifespan of your UAV systems.

bulletList.title: Worldwide Support Network
bulletList.content: A global network of experts providing technical guidance, logistics, and maintenance services wherever your UAVs operate.

bulletList.title: 24/7 Response Team
bulletList.content: Round-the-clock support to quickly resolve issues, minimize downtime, and ensure mission-critical operations continue uninterrupted. Maximize UAV uptime with our expert after-sales and maintenance services — reliable, scalable, and mission-ready. Contact us today.

content.exp: Our comprehensive suite of UAV services is designed to ensure the success of your aerial missions, providing expert guidance, technical support, and operational efficiency. Below are the key offerings that can enhance your UAV operations:

bulletList.title: Mission Planning Consultation
bulletList.content: Expert consultation to design mission strategies, optimize flight plans, and ensure operational efficiency for complex UAV missions.

bulletList.title: On-Site Deployment & Testing
bulletList.content: Professional on-site deployment and system testing to validate UAV readiness and ensure smooth mission execution.

bulletList.title: Standard Operation Guides
bulletList.content: Customized operation manuals and SOPs to streamline UAV usage, enhance safety, and standardize team workflows.

bulletList.title: Data & System Integration
bulletList.content: Seamless integration of UAV systems and collected data into existing operational platforms, enabling real-time analytics and mission insight. Ensure mission success with our comprehensive project and operational UAV support — tailored, scalable, and mission-ready. Contact us today.

content.exp: Building Long-Term Value with Global Partners. Expand your UAV business with trusted OEM, distribution, and compliance support.

bulletList.title: OEM/ODM Services
bulletList.content: Custom-designed UAV platforms, payload integrations, and communication modules tailored to your mission requirements. From industrial design to full-system assembly, we help you build your own brand.

bulletList.title: Distributor & Channel Support
bulletList.content: End-to-end partner enablement: regional market onboarding, pricing strategy, marketing assets, and dedicated post-sales engineering support to accelerate your growth.

bulletList.title: Tender & Certification Assistance
bulletList.content: Guidance on regional standards, documentation preparation, performance reporting, and compliance consulting—helping you confidently enter government, enterprise, and large-scale tenders.

bulletList.title: Trade & Logistics Coordination
bulletList.content: Global shipping coordination, export documentation, device labeling, regulatory checks, and safe-packaging solutions for UAV systems and LiPo batteries.

content.exp: Continuous Innovation for Evolving Mission Needs. More than hardware — we ensure your UAV operations stay modern, secure, and optimized.

bulletList.title: Software & Hardware Upgrades
bulletList.content: Regular firmware enhancements, module upgrades, and system optimization to keep your fleet at peak performance.

bulletList.title: Application Consulting
bulletList.content: Scenario-based consulting for industrial, security, and infrastructure applications—helping you match the right UAV solution to every mission.

bulletList.title: Data Security & Compliance
bulletList.content: Robust protection for communication, storage, and cloud workflows. Compliance guidance aligned with regional data and aviation standards.

bulletList.title: Customer Success Program
bulletList.content: Dedicated lifecycle support, performance monitoring, onboarding, and mission-readiness planning to ensure long-term operational success.
